headline: Looking at the Narrative for Dow as Analyst Sentiment Shifts After Recent Developments
summary: Dow Inc.'s consensus analyst price target has edged down slightly, moving from $27.94 to $27.82. This reflects subtle shifts in market sentiment after the latest round of earnings and analyst commentary. The modest adjustment highlights a balance between optimism driven by operational improvements and cost-cutting, and caution due to ongoing sector volatility. Stay tuned to discover the key factors behind these changes and how you can stay ahead of evolving narratives affecting Dow...

headline: Kyndryl (KD) Expands Dow Partnership to Modernize Infrastructure with AI and Automation for Enhanced Agility
summary: Kyndryl Holdings Inc. (NYSE:KD) is one of the cheap US stocks to buy according to analysts. On November 18, Kyndryl announced the expansion of its collaboration with Dow (NYSE:DOW), which is a global leader in materials science. The expanded agreement focuses on modernizing Dow’s infrastructure applications by using AI and automation to enhance operational agility and […]
